content:
Hey @T-libs, can you all fill in what times would work for you for our weekly meeting? https://doodle.com/poll/nhv5epur77xm8qam

Also, anyone else who might join regularly, feel free to fill it in too. (cc @bstrie, @Jane Lusby)
i provided a very constrained response with times that i might optimistically be available. but i won't be available always. so i'd say prioritize my availability the least.
